Name: Vespasius
Description: A powerful assault perk that increases damage output.

Name: Rampage
Description: Increases speed and damage during combat.

Name: Overdrive
Description: Boosts attack power after a certain number of kills.

Name: Shatter
Description: Increases the chance of critical hits.

Name: Guardian
Description: Provides a shield to absorb incoming damage.

Name: Stealth
Description: Allows the player to move without being detected.

Name: Lethal Precision
Description: Increases headshot damage and accuracy.

Name: Quick Reload
Description: Reduces reload time for all weapons.

Name: Eagle Eye
Description: Improves long-range accuracy and vision.

Name: Infiltrator
Description: Reduces noise while moving, improving stealth.

Name: Fury
Description: Increases attack speed with melee weapons.

Name: Tactician
Description: Increases the effectiveness of tactical equipment.

Name: Hacker
Description: Gives the ability to hack enemy systems.

Name: Juggernaut
Description: Reduces damage taken from bullets and explosions.

Name: Medic
Description: Increases health regeneration and healing speed.

Name: Blitz
Description: Increases movement speed for a short duration after a kill.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Boosts stamina and endurance during prolonged fights.

Name: Vigilant
Description: Improves awareness of surrounding threats.

Name: Berserker
Description: Increases damage resistance and melee attack power.

Name: Night Vision
Description: Improves vision in low-light conditions.

Name: Decoy
Description: Creates a distraction to confuse enemies.

Name: Survivor
Description: Grants immunity to environmental hazards.

Name: Tracker
Description: Highlights enemy positions on the map.

Name: Scavenger
Description: Increases item collection speed and item drop rate.

Name: Phantom
Description: Grants invisibility for a limited time.
